<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_463716_rp_draft_rp_enrollment_rule</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_463716_rp_draft_rp_enrollment_rule">order_guide_enrollment=true^EQ<item endquery="false" field="order_guide_enrollment" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="true"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Retrieve Order Guide Items</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	gs.info('zvg')
	current.setValue('items', new x_463716_rp_draft.RPDraftUtills().getOGItems(current.getValue('sys_id')));

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zdravko.verguilov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-10-23 20:08:00</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>9c456bd407365510d44bf16c7c1ed020</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Retrieve Order Guide Items</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="RP Draft" source="x_463716_rp_draft">221bdf0b07e01110d44bf16c7c1ed067</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="RP Draft">221bdf0b07e01110d44bf16c7c1ed067</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_9c456bd407365510d44bf16c7c1ed020</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zdravko.verguilov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-10-23 20:20:39</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before_display</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=9c456bd407365510d44bf16c7c1ed020"/></record_update>
